metadata.feature_description: Like and unlike wiki articles with like count display

steps.action: Login to DNN site as superuser
steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.expected: Wiki Test page with wiki articles displayed
steps.actual: Wiki Test page appears empty in view mode - wiki modules not visible without edit mode

steps.action: Enable Edit mode to view wiki modules
steps.actual: Edit mode shows wiki modules with 5 articles in LeftPane

steps.action: Click on article link to access article detail view with Like button
steps.expected: Article detail view with Like, Bookmark, Subscribe buttons visible
steps.actual: Article detail page (Wiki-Test/Test-Article-for-Search) loads but shows empty content - the Wiki module is not configured on article detail pages to display the article content and social actions

issues: Article detail pages do not have the Wiki module configured to display article content
The Article.ascx control which contains the Like button is not rendered on article URLs
Wiki modules only show article list view, not article detail view with social actions

steps.action: Attempt to access article detail view to find Unlike button
steps.expected: Article detail view with Unlike button visible (when already liked)
steps.actual: Cannot access article detail view - same issue as Like test

issues: Cannot test Unlike functionality because article detail view is not accessible
The Unlike button is part of Article.ascx which is not rendered on article pages

steps.action: Navigate to article detail view to see like count display
steps.expected: Like count displayed below article content (e.g., '0 people like this' or 'X people like this')
steps.actual: Article detail view not accessible - like count display (controlled by model.likeString()) cannot be verified

issues: Like count display is part of Article.ascx which requires the Wiki module on article detail pages
The likeString binding in the template is not rendered because the module is not present

observations: Code review confirms Like functionality exists in Article.ascx (lines 33-38 for like/unlike buttons, line 115 for like count display)
The JavaScript file dnn.wiki.Article.js contains like(), unlike(), and likes() methods that integrate with the Social Library
The Wiki module on the Wiki Test page correctly displays article list with titles and 'View Full Page' links
Clicking article links navigates to article-specific URLs (e.g., /Wiki-Test/Test-Article-for-Tagging) but these pages do not have the Wiki module configured
The article detail pages only show the trial warning message and footer - no article content or social actions are displayed
This appears to be a page template/module configuration issue in the test environment rather than a code defect
The Like feature requires the Wiki module to be added to article detail page templates with the Article.ascx control
